title: Minimum indemnity level
context: ยง435E-17 Minimum indemnity level. Each participating member shall be covered by such interindemnity arrangement for not less than $100,000 for each claim and not less than $300,000 annual aggregate of professional negligence, with the terms and conditions of such coverage to be specified in the trust agreement. [L 1977, c 182, pt of ยง1]
